message:
my very bad experience with RackSpace, once you open an official account with them, they will get you charged even for nothing
AVOID them unless you really know how to play with them

data.message:
If they're not refunding and you're in for a fight, issue a transaction dispute at your bank. Request a charge back, displaying evidence of misconduct on their behalf.

That's if you have such evidence... but if they've explicitly explained or even hinted at the possibility of being charged as per your current balance then you're shit out of luck.
I remember last month you talked about that issue. Didn't you close your account already?
After communicating with them last month, I deleted all servers in my account

this months they charged me for just having an account, even if it has nothing in it
--
I deleted everything related to them now
